alert.note: Alert for Kaibab Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 28 at 1:28PM MST until December 28 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING ABOVE 6500 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow above 6500 feet. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Areas above 6500 feet near Jacob Lake. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Additional snow forecast from 1 PM Today to 11 PM Today: Jacob Lake 1 to 2 inches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
